verses.roman:
advaita kahe,--satya kahi, nā kariha kopa
laguḍa phirāite pāra, tabe jāni gopa

synonyms: advaita kahe—Advaita Ācārya says; satya kahi—I speak the truth; nā kariha kopa—please do not be angry; laguḍa—stick, staff; phirāite pāra—if You can wheel around; tabe jāni—then I shall understand; gopa—cowherd boy.
translation: It was at this time that Śrīla Advaita Ācārya said, "Please do not be angry. I speak the truth. I shall know whether You are a cowherd boy only if You can wheel this rod about."
